meanings.definition: A period of excessive indulgence in an activity, especially eating or drinking.
meanings.sent1: After the party, she went on a binge and ate a whole cake by herself.
meanings.sent2: He regretted his binge on junk food when he felt sick afterwards.
meanings.sent3: During the holiday season, everyone goes on a binge with all the delicious treats around.
meanings.sent4: Her binge on shopping left her with a closet full of clothes she never wore.
meanings.sent5: The binge on ice cream was so satisfying but made her feel guilty later.

meanings.definition: To indulge in an activity, especially eating or drinking, to excess.
meanings.sent1: She tends to binge on snacks while watching movies late at night.
meanings.sent2: They decided to binge on pizza and soda for their movie marathon.
meanings.sent3: He would binge on video games for hours without taking a break.
meanings.sent4: The students would binge on studying the night before the exam.
meanings.sent5: After a long week, she liked to binge on relaxation by taking bubble baths.
